title: An idea for a possible Jax Gameplay Update
body:
I had this idea about {{champion:24}} awhile back, since he is the Grandmaster at Arms. Imagine Jax having his own real upgradeable weapons at the store, similar to Vik's HexCore, or Gangplanks ult upgrades. However, Jax can only purchase one of these items. Maybe a Broadsword that grants AD. A Trident that grants attack speed. A Bo Staff that grants AP. A bow that makes him ranged? Or even a magical lamppost that increases his armor and magic resist. It could anything really.

His skills would likely stay the same but the rest of your build is heavily influenced by which of these weapons you purchase. I feel it'd be a cool idea and really encourage build diversity.

Sounds great as an idea, but absolutely a balance nightmare. I like the theme, but he shouldn't get 'options'. He should have a linear upgrade path for his weapon. How about, when he hits lvl 6, 11, 16, on his back he can upgrade his weapon to give him bonus stats. It fits with his theme, and fits with his current scaling in-game: decent in early game, but shines in the late game.
Please, no more stupid gimmicks like this. Rengar couldn't be balanced around it. Viktor couldn't be balanced around it. It doesn't work.
Viktor couldn't be balanced around it?

Viktor has been reworked, and then basically gutted. He was clunky, then strong, and now weak. I don't think most builds even upgrade his forced item/gimmick until lategame...they just get the E upgrade (which should just be base tbh) and then ignore it until mid/late game. He's also rocking a >48% winrate, which I personally think is not ideal for any champion in this game. 

A passive that is essentially "free" stats is unfun and restricting. The evolution gimmick works well on Khazix; not so much on Viktor. On Viktor it just feels like you're being limited or being held back...it doesn't feel good. When I upgrade something on Viktor, I want to be able to feel like extra power is being added to my aresenal of robotic badassery. Right now, it feels like I am missing much needed power and I can't perform or function properly without it. On top of all of that, needing gold to progress with the evolution makes it feel very feast or famine.

This is just my 2 cents, though.

48% is a pretty fair win rate, I think. 45~55% is generally good enough imo, since we're never gonna get 50% WR for everyone.
